DOC.brief_summary: Study to evaluate efficacy and tolerability of Micardis速/Micardis速 Plus under usual daily-practice prescribing conditions in hypertensive patients
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Efficacy and Tolerability of Micardis速/Micardis速 Plus in Patients With Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Males and females for whom a medical antihypertensive therapy is indicated Age >= 18 years Age < 18 years
